ack.p: The authors thank the patients who participated in this research. We also thank the CDC (USA) for providing the qRT-PCR serotyping kit and are grateful to Drs. S Shresta, M McCauley and AE Ngono (La Jolla Institute for Immunology, CA, USA) and Dr. S Zompi (Karius Inc., CA, USA) for their gifts of reagents and equipment. We thank R Tuladhar, J Shakya, C Khanal, M Thapa, and TB Budha for their assistance with the laboratory work and to Nepal Academy of Science and Technology (NAST) and Dr. K Pandey, Dr. D Khadka and M. KC for sequencing. Special thanks go to the Central Department of Biotechnology, TU for providing the laboratory facilities and to the hospital staff who collected the samples.
